properties.areaDesc: New Buffalo MI to St Joseph MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 15 at 6:54PM EST until February 16 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a
Small Craft Advisory, which is in effect until 4 AM EST Sunday.

* WINDS...Southwest 15 to 25 knots becoming west 10 to 15 knots
overnight. Gusts up to 30 knots in the evening.

* WAVES...3 to 6 feet subsiding to 2 to 4 feet overnight.
properties.instruction:
A small craft advisory means that sustained winds or frequent
gusts of 22 to 33 knots are likely...and/or waves greater than
4 feet are expected. Inexperienced mariners...especially those
operating smaller vessels should avoid navigating in these
conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST SUNDAY... ...GALE WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 7 PM EST THIS EVENING
